name: grim-neigh
effect: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.
short_effect: Boosts Special Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.
